articles.title: Janhvi Kapoor serves the perfect outfit for Valentine's week in a red lace corset gown - Times of India
articles.description: Janhvi Kapoor is Valentine's Day red-dy.
articles.content: Her all-red ensemble featured a corset bodice, a bodycon fit, an off-the-shoulder design, a plunging neckline, sheer details, lacework and a plain deep red bottom with an elongated train.
